alert.note: Alert for Dewey; Stanley; Sully (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 7:29PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Sully, northwestern Stanley and southeastern Dewey Counties through 900 PM CDT/800 PM MDT/... At 828 PM CDT/728 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ridgeview to 12 miles southwest of Laplant to 13 miles northwest of Little Bend Rec Area to 11 miles southeast of Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Bend Rec Area, Mission Ridge and Swiftbird Day School. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
